.. index:: AlgebraGivenByStructuralConstants

.. _l416c6765627261476976656e42795374727563747572616c436f6e7374616e7473:

AlgebraGivenByStructuralConstants(R, n, ls, gamma)
==================================================

:viewcode:`naalg.spad line 1 <naalg.spad#L1>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <naalg.spad#L1>`

* R: \ :ref:`CommutativeRing <l436f6d6d7574617469766552696e67>`\ 

* n: \ :ref:`PositiveInteger <l506f736974697665496e7465676572>`\ 

* ls: \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`Symbol <l53796d626f6c>`\ 

* gamma: \ :ref:`Vector <l566563746f72>`\  \ :ref:`Matrix <l4d6174726978>`\  R


AlgebraGivenByStructuralConstants implements finite rank algebras over a commutative ring, given by the structural constants \ ``gamma``\  with respect to a fixed basis \ ``[a1, .., an]``\ , where \ ``gamma``\  is an \ ``n``\ -vector of \ ``n``\  by \ ``n``\  matrices \ ``[(gammaijk) for k in 1..rank()]``\  defined by \ ``ai * aj = gammaij1 * a1 + ... + gammaijn * an``\ . The symbols for the fixed basis have to be given as a list of symbols.


.. _l416c6765627261476976656e42795374727563747572616c436f6e7374616e7473-30:

\ :ref:`0 <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964-30>`\ \: % 
  from \ :ref:`AbelianMonoid <l4162656c69616e4d6f6e6f6964>`\

.. _l416c6765627261476976656e42795374727563747572616c436f6e7374616e7473-636f65726365:

\ :ref:`coerce <l436f65726369626c65546f-636f65726365>`\ \: % -> \ :ref:`OutputForm <l4f7574707574466f726d>`\  
  from \ :ref:`CoercibleTo <l436f65726369626c65546f>`\  \ :ref:`OutputForm <l4f7574707574466f726d>`\ 


.. index::
   pair: AlgebraGivenByStructuralConstants; coerce

:spadfun:`coerce`\: \ :ref:`Vector <l566563746f72>`\  R -> % 
  \ ``coerce(v)``\  converts a vector to a member of the algebra by forming a linear combination with the basis element. Note: the vector is assumed to have length equal to the dimension of the algebra.

.. _l416c6765627261476976656e42795374727563747572616c436f6e7374616e7473-636f6d6d757461746976653f:
